title: Ancient Indian statecraft as a model of hope
description: India’s approach to the world has been shaped by an inherited sense of what a political community should value, how it should act, and what kind of order it should aim to build

title: Mayan Blue: the ancient natural pigment of the Maya civilization
description: Mayan Blue, the ancient pigment of the Maya civilization, remains one of the most mysterious and enduring natural colorants ever discovered. A...The post Mayan Blue: the ancient natural pigment of the Maya civilization first appeared on The Yucatan Times.

title: Rare Cube-Shaped Skull Found In Mexico Sheds Light On Ancient Civilisation
description: Scientists examined the skull's bones and teeth and found that the individual likely lived in Tamaulipas his entire life.

title: Make Utility, Insurance, Fossil Fuel Industries Pay Their Fair Share for Wildfire Recovery and Invest in Reducing Climate Risk; Consumer Watchdog Submits Recommendations to CEA for Governor's Resiliency Report
description: LOS ANGELES, Dec. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- California should hold the industries responsible for fueling climate change, causing wildfires and withholding insurance benefits accountable for the costs of disaster recovery and prevention, Consumer Watchdog wrote in recommendations submitted for the Governor's study on catastrophe resilience and recovery. The group warned that insurance and utility ratepayers are already financially overburdened and argued utility, insurance and fossil fuel companies should bear their fair share of the cost of climate change-driven weather disasters."Utility and insurance consumers ...Full story available on Benzinga.com
